UnavailableDatasourceException - Exception in de.tif.jacob.core.exception
This exception indicates that the implementation (type) of a required data source is not available.

This exception indicates that the implementation (type) of a required transformer is not available.

Constructs the UnavailableTransformerException.
UncommittedLinkedRecordException - Exception in de.tif.jacob.core.exception
This exception indicates that a record is going to be saved (committed), which is linked to an uncommitted record.

UNLIMITED_RECORDS - Static variable in interface de.tif.jacob.core.data.IDataRecordSet
This constant should be used to set the maximum number of records to unlimited.
UPDATE - Static variable in interface de.tif.jacob.screen.IGuiElement
The group state for the update mode, i.e. the data record displayed within the group is going to be updated by an user.
updateSelectedRecord(String) - Method in interface de.tif.jacob.core.data.IDataTable
Brings the selected record into the update mode, by means of executing the following steps: locking the record reloading the record from database propagating the current record by use of the given relationset.

UserException - Exception in de.tif.jacob.core.exception
UserException is the base class of all (non runtime) exceptions which in general result due to inproper user operation.
UserException(String) - Constructor for exception de.tif.jacob.core.exception.UserException
Constructs a new user exception with the specified detail message.
UserException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception de.tif.jacob.core.exception.UserException
Constructs a new user exception with the specified detail message.
UserException(String, String) - Constructor for exception de.tif.jacob.core.exception.UserException
Constructs a new user exception with the specified message and additional exception details.
UserException(String, String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception de.tif.jacob.core.exception.UserException
Constructs a new user exception with the specified message and additional exception details.
UserException(Message) - Constructor for exception de.tif.jacob.core.exception.UserException
Constructs a new user exception with the specified internationalized detail message.
UserException(Message, String) - Constructor for exception de.tif.jacob.core.exception.UserException
Constructs a new user exception with the specified internationalized message and additional exception details.
UserException(Message, Throwable) - Constructor for exception de.tif.jacob.core.exception.UserException
Constructs a new user exception with the specified internationalized detail message and an additional exception cause.
UserException(Message, String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception de.tif.jacob.core.exception.UserException
Constructs a new user exception with the specified internationalized detail message and an additional exception cause.

UserRuntimeException - Exception in de.tif.jacob.core.exception
UserRuntimeException is the base class of all runtime exceptions which in general result due to inproper user operation.

Constructs a new user runtime exception with the specified detail message.

UserRuntimeException(Message, Throwable) - Constructor for exception de.tif.jacob.core.exception.UserRuntimeException
Constructs a new user exception with the specified internationalized detail message and an additional exception cause.
